items.title: MCX to launch electricity futures contract from July 10, sees demand for risk management instruments
items.description: MCX said the launch is timely as the electricity sector has been seeing 'significant growth' along with the need to manage price stability, fluctuating demand, fuel costs, and other market developments.

items.title: Hardeep Singh Brar joins BMW Group India as President and CEO
items.description: Brar succeeds Vikram Pawah, who is taking charge as CEO of BMW Group Australia and New Zealand

items.title: Krsnaa Diagnostics receives fresh Letter of Award from Rajasthan, ending two-year long wait after litigation delayed expansion
items.description: Krsnaa Diagnostics and TCIL initiated legal proceedings to challenge the cancellation and in August 2023, the Rajasthan High Court reinstated the contract, thus reviving the agreement with the Krsnaa–TCIL consortium.

items.title: Gold companies post shining performance in Q1 FY26
items.description: Regulatory moves and consumer preference for branded products among factors helping companies like Titan, Senco Gold, and Sky Gold

items.title: FMCG preview: Charting a comeback aided by urban demand recovery, easing inflation
items.description: Strong brands, higher salience of premium portfolio, and vast geographical footprint will remain key growth catalysts

items.title: India’s E2W Market: Can Ather overtake Ola?
items.description: The electric two-wheeler race tightens as competition heats up
